a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child mortality vs. health expenditure, 1970 to 2015
Health financing is reported as the annual per capita health expenditure and is adjusted for inflation and
price level differences between countries (measured in 2010 international dollars).
Data source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (via World Bank); Health Expenditure and Financing - OECDstat
